scripts.build: npm run build-communication-api && npm run build-main-api && npm run build-movie-processing-api
scripts.start-communication-api: npm run copy-env-file && nest start communication-api
scripts.start-main-api: npm run copy-env-file && nest start main-api
scripts.start-movie-processing-api: npm run copy-env-file && nest start movie-processing-api
scripts.start: npm run start-communication-api & npm run start-main-api & npm run start-movie-processing-api
scripts.start-communication-api:dev: npm run copy-env-file && nest start communication-api --watch
scripts.start-main-api:dev: npm run copy-env-file && nest start main-api --watch
scripts.start-movie-processing-api:dev: npm run copy-env-file && nest start movie-processing-api --watch
scripts.start:dev: npm run start-communication-api:dev & npm run start-main-api:dev & npm run start-movie-processing-api:dev
scripts.start-communication-api:debug: npm run copy-env-file && nest start communication-api --debug --watch
scripts.start-main-api:debug: npm run copy-env-file && nest start main-api --debug --watch
scripts.start-movie-processing-api:debug: npm run copy-env-file && nest start movie-processing-api --debug --watch
scripts.start:debug: npm run start-communication-api:debug & npm run start-main-api:debug & npm run start-movie-processing-api:debug
scripts.start:prod: npm run start-communication-api:prod & npm run start-main-api:prod & npm run start-movie-processing-api:prod
